summary: This document is an email chain between prosecutors and defense attorneys regarding procedural matters in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case (USA v. Maxwell). It discusses filing responses to motions, including one concerning the authentication of birth certificates, and coordination on redactions for expert witness briefing.

events.title: Filing of Letter Motion on Birth Certificates
events.description: The government files a letter motion addressed to Judge Nathan regarding the authentication of birth certificates.

keyFacts: The document shows ongoing procedural activity in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case (1:20-cr-00330-AJN) as of November 2021.
A specific legal issue involved a government motion to authenticate birth certificates (GX-52).
The email chain reveals coordination between prosecution and defense on filing responses and redactions for expert witness (Dietz/Loftus) briefing.
The document lists numerous attorneys of record for Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating a large defense team.
